Summary: A class that models an extension construct within an abstract syntax tree, storing its identifier and a collection of child nodes that form its content, and provides standard initialization and printable representation.

Business intent: To enable the parser or compiler to represent, manipulate, and traverse extension elements of source code as part of the AST, facilitating analysis, transformation, or code generation.
